author: cms-l1t-offline
body: Updates the new HLT L1T Seed Module, needed for the 2016, including parsing of object map to determine seeds, low-level object fixes to ensure Trigger Filter Object with References (to L1T seeds) is successfully written to the event record with desired payload.  (A number of technical problems with L1T objects were uncovered, and now fixed, when this module attempted to write edm::Ref of L1T BXVectors.)
title: Updates to the new HLT L1T Seeds Module for 2016 Run
